## User Story

**As a** [type of user],  
**I need** [some feature],  
**So that** [some benefit].

## Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Given [context],
When [action taken],
Then [expected result]
```

## Story Points
(Estimated points: _e.g., 2, 3, 5_)

## Labels
- [ ] enhancement  
- [ ] technical debt
